website_summaries.verdict: A great drop slot safe option for permanent installation on a door or wall. Perfect for small businesses.
pros: Easy installation using basic pre-drilled holes
Slot is large for bigger items
Comes with a basic locking mechanism for easy access to the interior compartment
cons: Requires permanent installation to be used correctly

customer_reviews.title: These boxes are heavy duty but there is a fundamental ...
customer_reviews.text: These boxes are heavy duty but there is a fundamental problem with their design: It is difficult to slip mail into the slot! The problem is there is a lip welded at the top of the retrieval door that the mail catches on when the mail carrier slips it in the front. The mail either gets bent or often the carrier simply leaves it hanging halfway out the front, defeating the security altogether. The back side of the box needs to be smooth to allow normal size envelopes to pass. Magazines and larger envelopes get mutilated. Needs a rethink!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Water Proof!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not water proof & is this not revealed when purchasing. The box is already installed and this is creating a very big dilemma on our end because the opening to install the Dropbox had to be cut in. A weather proofing solution is required to rectify this situation or it should not be sold at all.
customer_reviews.author: CEO

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Alot easier to install than I anticipated. Very well constructed and secure. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: kyle kriner

customer_reviews.title: Envelopes get stuck above door sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this over a year ago for my tenants to use. It gets used about twice a month. Twice now, an envelope with cash has gotten stuck in a way that someone could pull it back out. They get stuck on the top of that upper piece of metal that the door rests against. That piece is held by 3 spot welds. Between is a gap that paper fits into. I've tried caulking it so paper can't sit up there. Other that that, we've been happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kara M

customer_reviews.title: Bad design.
customer_reviews.text: Not designed very well. Lip on the back side of the locking door inside catches envelopes as they are dropped in and they don't fall all the way to the bottom. Envelopes can be seen and retrieved through the drop side door if it is not constantly emptied more then 5 or 6 envelopes will jam it up..
customer_reviews.author: Mark N.

customer_reviews.title: High quality easy to install but you will need some power tools.
customer_reviews.text: High quality easy to install but you will need some power tools. Works great on a solid core door. Looks nice and clean. Does the job as it should for our application. It should be noted we use these in an office building and are not exposed to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Sturdy with adjustable face plate
customer_reviews.text: NO instructions. Not that a DYI'er can't install, however there wasn't even a template to use to cut hole in door. Took the face plate to level and outline cutting area. Box itself is nice, solid and with adjustable face plate is a plus to install correctly. Also bought the "Drop Box" door sticker
customer_reviews.author: Tim Meal

customer_reviews.title: difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Mail person refuses to use this mailbox as its difficult to insert letters into the slot, there are teeth inside the box to prevent mail for easily being slid into box. Also, must use two hands to open slot and insert mail
customer_reviews.author: Fuzznitz

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for offices that receive items outside of normal office hours.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to aid in our quarantine of departments at work, now production can deposit documents to the office in a secure manner without having to come into the office. It is working out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trim plate bent
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy construction and thick painted finish. Good design and looks to be easy installation. Only problem is that the first one I received I sent back because of a bent cover plate for the mail chute. The replacement item had the same bent trim piece. Seems like something wrong in production hence the three star rating.
customer_reviews.author: FSterling

customer_reviews.title: Poor lock quality.
customer_reviews.text: Lock is of poor quality. The nut was loose, allowing the catch to rotate freely... because the square hole is twice the dimention of the square cam it is to set on.
customer_reviews.author: lyn923

customer_reviews.title: Heavy. Secure.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty drop box. Should last for years at our shop. Installs securely. No problem with our key envelopes dropping in. Easy to open with the key but would be hard to break into from inside or out. Gets used daily and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Poor QA. Sturdy but worthless
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews - mail gets stuck every time, anything larger than an envelop won’t drop in, there’s a design defect that catches the edges of envelopes and clogs the drop chute. It’s super sturdy thick hard steel, but with the design flaw completely makes this a useless product. They did no quality testing on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: thai

customer_reviews.title: Mailbox intake angle does not allow for mail
customer_reviews.text: This is the mailbox for you if you only have one thin letter or legal size envelope inserted at a time. It does not accommodate circulars, magazines, envelopes of any bulk. The angle for the postal worker to insert the mail is 90 degrees with very little depth. Additionally, the mail gets soaked because the door is perpetually left open because mail cannot make the 90 degree turn and drop. If I could give this a "0" star rating, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Htown

customer_reviews.title: Problem when it rains
customer_reviews.text: Need some redesign. First mails get stuck and won’t go all the way down and secondly most important when it rains, my mails get soaked and water fills up at bottom of the box. There should be some kind of hood supplied to eliminate this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and was complete. Using the bezel as a template draw the installation hole in the door. The installation was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Buy The Lake

customer_reviews.title: Not for exterior door
customer_reviews.text: Its solid and secure, but don't put it on an exterior door. It gets tons of water in it every time it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Necessary during quarantine times
customer_reviews.text: We installed this at our church. It looks great and allows folks to leave their tithes or messages securely. It's heavy duty and should serve well for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Roach

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this was expensive/ overpriced. But installation went well and it is seriously heavy duty. I am very impressed with the quality. Now, after 2 weeks installed, I can honestly say it is a great locking thru the door mail slot / vault.
customer_reviews.author: julian c from wv

customer_reviews.title: Super solid
customer_reviews.text: Super solid. You don't want to smack your knee on this thing. A bit pricey but excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Brenneman

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: We needed a drop box for our business, this worked perfectly. My husband installed in the door.
customer_reviews.author: ML Grant

customer_reviews.title: needs a rain seal or hood over door
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty box for sure, but even under a awning on a windy raining day this box will collect water so you have to provide a or build a small rain diverter (hood or roof) for it, company could surely incorporate some sort of rain seal or diverter into there design to help with this problem then it would be five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Secure giving
customer_reviews.text: Makes it so easy for our church members to give when no one is in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Null

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good Product. As Advertised. I added a hinged flap over the Door, just to make sure I didn't have any leaks when the rain fell on the front of the door. May have been OK without it but I didn't hurt. Strong, well built.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Fun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Painted to match the door and it looks superb. As others have mentioned, the visible screw heads could have been engineered better, but after painting over them, they disappear from thought. This item is functional, beautiful, and works great as a key drop. We aren't using it for bulky items, keys only.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Has a hammered paint look around edges. Overall product looks and works good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Has to be mounted under a cover or it leaks water when it rains
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure.
customer_reviews.text: No more lost or stolen rent. Renters feel secure dropping off payments. No one depends on USPS! Don’t have to wait around for renters to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: CJD

customer_reviews.title: Hollow core steel security door
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, professional product- we’re using it as a key and contract drop for our rental car agency. Requires slightly different hardware (bolts etc.) to mount in a steel hollow core security door but can be done with some common sense and ingenuity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for office mail.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a drop box in an office door. Installation was not that tricky with the right tool to cut the hole. We replaced and old one and just had to widen the hole slightly—but it looks a thousand times better than the old one... and it's much more secure. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jared C. Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box for my store, so that I could keep my office door locked and employees could drop our nightly cash into a secure place. It fits perfectly on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but is not weather resistant
customer_reviews.text: We use this at our auto repair shop to receive keys after hours. It seems to be sturdy and looks nice but it is not water proof and will fill up with water, which gets the envelopes and the keys wet. This would be better suited for an indoor environment.
customer_reviews.author: Gates Auto Repair

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: We installed this into an exterior wall. Looks very clean and performs its job as needed
customer_reviews.author: Arianne Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Good fit and finish. The box is very well constructed, the paint finish is very high quality and the box is very secure (heavy gauge steel)
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: The worst product in the world
customer_reviews.text: The worst product in the world! Do not get this with in 1 month the whole this is rusty and all the paint is coming of totally not made for what they advertise for dont want your money
customer_reviews.author: rochie

customer_reviews.title: This works wonderfully as a night key drop box for my drivers ...
customer_reviews.text: I manage a distribution center and often have drivers get back after the office has closed for the day. This works wonderfully as a night key drop box for my drivers and we don't have to worry about finding keys the next morning regardless of who shows up to work that day.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Moylan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have tenants and it is so easy for them to drop the rent into the box. I installed thru a steel door, had to get a Handy Man to cut the opening thru the door, but installation was easy after that.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Item was okay, package material was for something else
customer_reviews.text: Well it's obvious it was opened and returned at some point. While the drop box it self was fine and keys worked to the door.. There was not any hardware for install And the directions where for how to install windshield wipers.. lol
customer_reviews.author: nic jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and thick metal
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and thick metal. Drop door works perfectly. Have some trouble with the Key sticking and not working well. Usually a quick jiggle fixes it up.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty & easy to setup with the right tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amircat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mail Slot
customer_reviews.text: I would purchase this item again. It does what is says it does.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: This arrived timely and seems to be made very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great Drop Box for anything of value!
customer_reviews.text: I have a vehicle rental business that takes night drops of the vehicles. After having several vehicle stolen from the drop box i was using Imwent to the DuraBox. Since I have installed this Drop box my keys have never turned up missing. The Dura Bix does its job well!
customer_reviews.author: John Norris

customer_reviews.title: Does its job right
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second one recently for a new property. It's exactly what I needed for deposits. Tenants can drop their checks anytime and the checks can be picked up anytime. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: YamiG.

customer_reviews.title: Our durabox was much heavier duty than I expected. ...
customer_reviews.text: Our durabox was much heavier duty than I expected. I mounted it outside as a drop box for my renters.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy, secure! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a safe and secure place for our employees to put their paperwork and remaining perdiem after hours. This was not only easy to install but it is safe and secure. No more missing paperwork or MONEY!! EXCELLENT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl F.

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid and secure but take a few extra steps
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty construction. Needs drain holes drilled in the bottom as it can collect water and that’s not good for todays car keys.
customer_reviews.author: scott f

customer_reviews.title: Beige NOT Grey
customer_reviews.text: The color of this item does not match the picture nor the description of gray. I would describe it as beige, which is a disappointment because it does not match the exterior of the building
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: ... rain the angle of putting the mail in is horrible my mail is always sticking out the front
customer_reviews.text: This box gets wet in the rain the angle of putting the mail in is horrible my mail is always sticking out the front. I was very unhappy with this purchase and wish I could return it but unforunately it is after 30days
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Manchester

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Very sturdy! Will continue to use this in other properties.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Landon

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this drop box. I should have done this years ago. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Gene F.

customer_reviews.title: works great for my town home complex however if the tenants ...
customer_reviews.text: works great for my town home complex however if the tenants don't take care when putting in envelopes it could get jammed and allow some one to pull out some of the envelopes
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Two weeks and is already Rusting !
customer_reviews.text: We installed it two weeks ago and the part that goes outside t he door its already rusting. We live in Florida but 2 weeks its ridiculous. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Fernandez Annicaert

customer_reviews.title: Quality built
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Built well. For the price it’s top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: decided against "thru the wall" but it was a nice solid piece
customer_reviews.text: returned, decided against "thru the wall" but it was a nice solid piece!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Check

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! perfect for what I use it for. Product is nice and sturdy, does not seem cheap and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Installed box in door management office for residents to deposit rent checks.
customer_reviews.author: jeff leek

customer_reviews.title: Use at church finance room
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy of installation. I like the protection of dropping envelopes in a locked box. Blocked people from fishing envelopes out.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor DW

customer_reviews.title: Payment Drop Box
customer_reviews.text: This products is great! Now customers can drop off their payment any time of day.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Feels Sturdy and Heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted it in a solid wooden door, feels like it will last a long time and does it job.
customer_reviews.author: bike tech inc

customer_reviews.title: Lost key no replacement
customer_reviews.text: The box is great. My contractor lost the key after install and so far I cannot find a way to contact the seller. Will update and change rating if I do.
customer_reviews.author: bbridge0

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drop box wish i bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to drop an envelope or something a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Millynda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality construction. It comes with front and rear trim pieces that gives the installation a professional look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, there are bigger than expected but they do the job. they are sturdy and tuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Meets our needs
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Meets our needs. Our guys didn't have any problems installing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cannot fit the full size file envelope in them which what I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, would have been nice to have an installation template
customer_reviews.author: DeltaT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: No directions made it tougher to install than it needed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Marshall Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to build it in.
customer_reviews.text: You know whet though is, really content with your product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions.
customer_reviews.text: It may be well made, but there are no installation instructions. You are on your own to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: William Hugh Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: The top edge of the door blocks papers from falling ...
customer_reviews.text: The top edge of the door blocks papers from falling into the box and clearing the shoot door. If you leave lockable door open the shoot right out in the floor. Very dissapointing. Remove the lip pls and make this unit function for the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: To narrow the door caught the mail very small storage box
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Installation was relatively easy, but be careful not to cut too large ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty mailbox that arrived as described. Installation was relatively easy, but be careful not to cut too large an opening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Lock
customer_reviews.text: lock tab is cheap and flimsy. I had to bend the tap a little to make door shut tight. The box itself is heavy duty, so the cheap lock does not make sense. I guarantee I could break into this with a screwdriver with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is what we were looking for to accept rental ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is what we were looking for to accept rental checks after hours. The negatives are; there were no installation instructions. No weatherstripping for an exterior wall. The exterior screws are not the same color as the front plate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DuraBox Through-The-Door Locking Drop Box (D500) (Grey)
product_meta.description:
Color:GrayDuraBox D500 through-the-door locking drop box provides secure all-day depositing of valuable or private items such as cash, checks, car keys, remotes, small envelopes, and more. It features a piano hinge reinforced double steel door to prevent prying. Metal baffle inside the drop opening protects against fishing. Includes a pair of tubular keys that are harder to duplicate than standard keys for added security. 9-1/2" wide opening standard letters. Accommodates drop items up to 1-3/4" thick. The Durabox D500 through-door drop box requires making a rectangular cutout in a door. 

Features: 
Maximum thickness of drop items is 1-3/4" thick 
Designed for inside door mounting with the drop opening facing outside 
Piano hinge with reinforced double steel door protects against prying 
Tubular style key lock with Double "D" configuration (can be retrofitted with other cam locks) 
Recommended for inside use only
Metal baffle protects drop opening from fishing 
2 tubular keys 
Fits doors up to 1-3/4" thick 
Pre-drilled mounting holes in back (includes hardware)

Other Specifications: 
Drop Opening: 9-1/2" W x 1-3/4" H
Rear Collection Door: 9-1/2" W x 5-3/8" H 
Rear Collection Door Thickness: 1/8" 
Capacity: 505.25 cu in. 
Exterior Dimensions: 15" H x 12" W x 6" D 
Weight: 17 lbs. 
Warranty: 1 Year Manufacturer (applicable when used indoors only)
feature_bullets: Durable steel construction provides secure all-day depositing of valuable or private items such as cash, checks, car keys, remotes, small envelopes, and more.
Designed to be mounted on and through a door requiring a rectangular cutout for the unit.
Deposit slot opening is 9-1/2" wide and accomodates items up to 1-3/4" thick.
Lock type: tubular key, Capacity: 505 cubic inches, Exterior dimensions: 15" H x 12" W x 6" D, Weight: 17 lbs
Because of the security baffles, this unit is not ideal for receiving large mail items such as books, magazines, catalogs, booklets, manila envelopes, and other larger mail.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars191 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
